settings.title: Affiliates
settings.subtitle: A PARTNERSHIP TO FEEL GOOD ABOUT
settings.text: Partnering with Booksio goes a long way. Becoming an affiliate not only racks in the dough- but more importantly helps the world! For each purchase you drive, 10% automatically is donated back to a charity of the customer's choice- a transaction you can stand behind. Charitable giving has never been more effortless than working with Booksio. Business can be both profitable and for the greater good!

settings.title: All Products Are Commissionable
settings.text: Products Categories Include: Print Books, eBooks, Audio Books, Print Magazines, Digital Magazines & Gift Cards.

settings.title: 10% Charitable Donation
settings.text: 10% of each purchase will be donated to a charity of the customer's choice.

settings.title: Boost Morale With Freebies
settings.text: Boost team morale when you offer free titles each month.

settings.title: Become a Booksio Affiliate
settings.text: Booksio connects the content you want with the causes you care about most. Through our extensive catalog of books, magazines, and more, you can get inspired, learn a skill, and explore new worlds — all while supporting the charity of your choice.

settings.title: Sign up to become a Booksio Affiliate today.
